attributes.action: award Chris Lightfoot, developer of the petitions.pm.gov.uk website software a posthumous honour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Chris Lightfoot died on February 11th 2007 at the age of 28.

This highly talented individual could have taken a highly paid job in finance but instead dedicated himself to working on important web-based projects supporting our society and communities including this petitions.pm.gov.uk website, WriteToThem, HearFromYourMP and PledgeBank and Neighbourhood Fix-It. He was also a passionate campaigner and activist especially concerning the sharing of personal data.

Please sign this petition if you think Chris should be rewarded posthumously with an honour in recognition and appreciation of his outstanding, selfless efforts.
